# ***I. SI Session Policy & Procedures***
## ***<u>1. Before the SI Session</u>***
### ***a. You <u>MUST</u> bring these following items below to join SI Session:***

1. Laptop or Tablet (including your charger if possible).
2. Your notebook(s) to take note.
3. Confidence feelings.

### ***b. You <u>MUST NOT</u> bring these following items below to join SI Session:***

1. Harmful object (knife, sword, gun,...).
2. Hot food or stale food (if you want to eat hot food, please bring it outside my session).
3. Angry or upset feelings (I cannot let you join if you are not engaging with others students).
